text:
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ ﴿1﴾
الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ ﴿2﴾ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ ﴿3﴾ مَالِكِ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ ﴿4﴾ إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ ﴿5﴾ اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ ﴿6﴾ صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ ﴿7﴾.
 [الفاتحة: 1-7]
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
In the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful (1)
Praise be to God, Lord of the worlds. (2) The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. (3) Master of the Day of Judgment. (4) You alone we worship, and You alone we seek help. (5) Guide us. The Straight Path (6) The path of those whom You have bestowed, not upon whom is Your anger, nor of those who go astray (7).
 [Al-Fatihah: 1-7]

text:
الم ﴿1﴾ ذَلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ ﴿2﴾ الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ ﴿3﴾ وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآَخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ ﴿4﴾ أُولَئِكَ عَلَى هُدًى مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ وَأُولَئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ ﴿5﴾. 
 [البقرة: 1-5]
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
(1) This is the Book in which there is no doubt, a guidance for the righteous. (2) Those who believe in the unseen and establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided them. (3) And those who believe in what has been revealed to you, and what was sent down before you, and are certain of the Hereafter. (4) Those are upon guidance from their Lord. And those are the ones who are successful.(5) 
 [Al-Baqarah: 1-5]

text:
أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنْ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
اللّهُ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ لَّهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الأَرْضِ مَن ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلاَ يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِّنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلاَّ بِمَا شَاء وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالأَرْضَ وَلاَ يَؤُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
 [آية الكرسى - البقرة 255].
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
I seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan
God, there is no god but He, the Ever-Living, the Ever-Subsisting. Neither year nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is there who can intercede with Him except Him? By His permission, He knows what is before them and what is behind them, and they do not comprehend any of His knowledge except what He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, but He does not turn it away. He preserved them, and He is the Most High, the Great.
 [Ayat Al-Kursi - Al-Baqarah 255].

text:
لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَإِنْ تُبْدُوا مَا فِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ يُحَاسِبْكُمْ بِهِ اللَّهُ فَيَغْفِرُ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَاللَّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ ﴿284﴾ آَمَنَ الرَّسُولُ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ رَبِّهِ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ كُلٌّ آَمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَمَلَائِكَتِهِ وَكُتُبِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍ مِنْ رُسُلِهِ وَقَالُوا سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا غُفْرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ ﴿285﴾ لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا اكْتَسَبَتْ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِنْ نَسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَا إِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا أَنْتَ مَوْلَانَا فَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ ﴿286﴾.
 [البقرة: 284-286]
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
To God belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and whether you reveal what is within yourselves or hide it, God will call you to account therewith. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whomever He wills, and God has power over all things. (284) The Messenger believes in what was revealed to him from his Lord, and the believers each believe in God and His angels and His Scriptures. And His Messengers, We make no distinction between any of His Messengers. And they said, “We have heard and obeyed. Your forgiveness is our Lord, and to You is the return.” (285) God does not burden a soul except It is sufficient for her what she has earned, and it is upon her what she has earned. Our Lord, do not hold us accountable if we forget or make a mistake. Our Lord, and do not burden us with as much burden as You imposed it on those before us. Our Lord, and do not burden us with what we have no ability to bear, but pardon us and forgive us and have mercy on us. You are our Lord, so help us against The disbelieving people (286).
 [Al-Baqarah: 284-286]

text:
قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ ﴿1﴾ لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ ﴿2﴾ وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ ﴿3﴾ وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَا عَبَدْتُمْ ﴿4﴾ وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ ﴿5﴾ لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ ﴿6﴾.
 [الكافرون]
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
Say, O you disbelievers: (1) I do not worship what you worship. (2) Nor are you worshipers of what I worship. (3) Nor am I a worshiper of what you worshipped. (4) Nor do you worship what I worship. (5) You have your religion, and I have mine. (6)
 [Unbelievers]

text:
قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ ﴿1﴾ اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ ﴿2﴾ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ ﴿3﴾ وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ ﴿4﴾.
 [الإخلاص]
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
Say: He is God, the One.
 [Sincerity]

text:
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ ﴿1﴾ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ ﴿2﴾ وَمِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ ﴿3﴾ وَمِنْ شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ ﴿4﴾ وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ ﴿5﴾.
 [الفلق]
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of Creation (1) from the evil of what He has created (2) and from the evil of darkness when it approaches (3) and from the evil of blowing into the knots (4) and from the evil of An envier when he envies.(5)
 [Al-Falaq]

text:
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ ﴿1﴾ مَلِكِ النَّاسِ ﴿2﴾ إِلَهِ النَّاسِ ﴿3﴾ مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ ﴿4﴾ الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ ﴿5﴾ مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ ﴿6﴾.
 [الناس]
hint-en: Ruqyah from the Holy Quran
text-en:
Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of the people (1) the King of the people (2) the God of the people (3) from the evil of the deceitful whisperer (4) who whispers in the hearts of the people (5) Of Paradise and people (6)
 [the people]

text: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ، وَبِوَجْهِهِ الْكَرِيمِ، وَسُلْطَانِهِ الْقَدِيمِ، مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I seek refuge in God Almighty, His gracious face, and His eternal authority, from the accursed Satan.

text: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ، مِنْ هَمْزِهِ وَنَفْخِهِ وَنَفْثِهِ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan, from his whispering, blowing, and spitting.

text: أعوذُ بكلماتِ اللهِ التامَّةِ ، مِن كُلِّ شيطانٍ وهامَّةٍ ، ومِن كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لامَّةٍ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God, from every devil and monster, and from every evil eye.

text: أعوذُ بكلماتِ اللهِ التامَّاتِ مِن شرِّ ما خَلق.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created.

text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ أَرْقِيكَ، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ يُؤْذِيكَ، مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ نَفْسٍ أَوْ عَيْنِ حَاسِدٍ، اللَّهُ يَشْفِيكَ، بِسْمِ اللَّهِ أَرْقِيكَ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: In the name of God, I perform ruqyah for you, from everything that harms you, from the evil of every soul or the envious eye. May God heal you, in the name of God, I perform ruqyah for you.

text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ .
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: In the name of God.

text: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ .
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I seek refuge in God and His power from the evil that I encounter and beware.

text: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، أَنْ يُعَافِيَكَ وَيَشْفِيَكَ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I ask God Almighty, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to grant you health and healing.

text: اللَّهُمَّ ربَّ النَّاسِ، أَذْهِب الْبَأسَ، واشْفِ، أَنْتَ الشَّافي لا شِفَاءَ إِلاَّ شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفاءً لا يُغَادِرُ سقَماً.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, Lord of people, remove the affliction and heal. You are the healer. There is no cure except your healing, a healing that leaves no sickness behind.

text: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِ عَبْدَكَ، وصَدِّقْ رَسُولَك.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, heal your servant, and tell the truth of your messenger.

text: اللهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَيْهِ، وَأَذْهِبْ عَنْهُ حَرَّ الْعَيْنِ وَبَرْدَهَا وَوَصَبَهَا.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, bless him, and remove from him the heat, cold, and irritation of the eye.

text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ مَا سَأَلَكَ مِنْهُ نَبِيُّكَ مُحَمَّدٌ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَنَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا اسْتَعَاذَ مِنْهُ نَبِيُّكَ مُحَمَّدٌ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَنْتَ الْمُسْتَعَانُ، وَعَلَيْكَ الْبَلَاغُ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, we ask you for the good of what your Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, asked you for, and we seek refuge in You from the evil of which your Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, sought refuge from you. The one who seeks help, and upon you is the conveyance of the message, and there is no power nor strength except in God.

text: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيمُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْكَرِيمِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَرَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: There is no god but God, the Great, the Forbearing, there is no god but God, Lord of the Noble Throne, there is no god but God, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the Great Throne.

text: رَبّنَا الَّلهُ الذِي فِي السَّمَاءِ، تَقَدَّسَ اسمُكَ، أَمرُكَ فِي السَّمَاءِ وَالأَرْضِ، كَمَا رَحمَتُكَ فِي السَّمَاءِ فَاجْعَلْ رَحْمَتَكَ فِي الأَرْضِ، اغفِر لَنَا حَوْبَنَا وَخَطَايَانَا، أَنتَ رَبُّ الطَّيِّبِينَ، أَنزِلْ رَحْمَةً مِن رَحمَتِكَ، وَشِفَاءً مِن شِفَائِكَ عَلَى هَذَا الوَجَعِ، فَيَبرَأ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Our Lord God, who is in heaven, hallowed be your name, your command in heaven and earth, just as your mercy was in heaven, so show your mercy on earth, forgive us our debts. And our sins. You are the Lord of the good. Send down a mercy from your mercy and a cure from your healing on this pain, and it will be healed.

text: أَعُوذُ بِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ الْكَرِيمِ، وَبِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ، اللَّاتِي لَا يُجَاوِزُهُنَّ بَرٌّ وَلَا فَاجِرٌ، مِنْ شَرِّ مَا يَنْزِلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَشَرِّ مَا يُعْرُجُ فِيهَا، وَشَرِّ مَا ذَرَأَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَشَرِّ مَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا، وَمِنْ فِتَنِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ، وَمِنْ طَوَارِقِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ، إِلَّا طَارِقًا يَطْرُقُ بِخَيْرٍ يَا رَحْمَنُ .
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I seek refuge in the Noble Face of God, and in the perfect words of God, which neither the righteous nor the immoral can pass over, from the evil of what descends from the sky and the evil of what ascends. Therein, and the evil of what He has spread in the earth and the evil of what comes out of it, and of the temptations of the night and the day, and of the disturbances of the night and the day, except for one who escapes. It's going well, O Most Merciful.

text: بِسـمِ اللهِ الذي لا يَضُـرُّ مَعَ اسمِـهِ شَيءٌ في الأرْضِ وَلا في السّمـاءِ وَهـوَ السّمـيعُ العَلـيم.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: In the name of God, with whose name nothing can be harmed on earth or in heaven, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

text: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ ، وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ ، وَمَنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ ، وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from His wrath and punishment, from the evil of His servants, and from the prodding of the devils, and from their presence.

text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ ، أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ الْكَبِيرِ مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ عِرْقٍ نَعَّارٍ ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَرِّ النَّارِ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: In the name of God Almighty, I seek refuge in God Almighty from the evil of every race of fire, and from the evil of the heat of the Fire.

text: بِسْمِ اللهِ تربَةُ أَرْضِنَا، بِرِيقةِ بَعْضِنَا، يُشْفَى سَقِيمُنَا، بإِذْنِ رَبِّنَا.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: In the name of God, the soil of our land, the saliva of each other, our sick will be healed, with the permission of our Lord.

text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ بِأَنَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، الْمَنَّانُ يَا بَدِيعَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ، يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ، يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, I ask you that praise be to you, there is no god but you, the benefactor, the creator of the heavens and the earth, the possessor of majesty and honor, the living O Ever-Living One.

text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ بِأَنِّي أَشْهَدُ أَنَّكَ أَنْتَ اللَّه لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، الأَحَدُ، الصَّمَدُ، الَّذِي لَمْ يَلِدْ، وَلَمْ يُولَدْ، وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, I ask you that I bear witness that you are God, there is no god but you, the One, the Eternal, the One who does not beget, nor was born, and there is no equal to Him. Sunday.

text: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، أَنْ يُعَافِيَكَ وَيَشْفِيَكَ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: I ask God Almighty, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to grant you health and healing.

text: اللَّهُمَّ بَرِّدْ قَلْبِي بِالثَّلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ وَالْمَاءِ الْبَارِدِ ، اللَّهُمَّ نَقِّ قَلْبِي مِنَ الْخَطَايَا كَمَا نَقَّيْتَ الثَّوْبَ الْأَبْيَضَ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, cool my heart with ice, hail, and cold water. Oh God, purify my heart from sins as you purified the white dress from filth.

text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَرِيمِ وَكَلِمَاتِكَ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَنْتَ آخِذٌ بِنَاصِيَتِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ تَكْشِفُ الْمَغْرَمَ وَالْمَأْثَمَ، اللَّهُمَّ لَا يُهْزَمُ جُنْدُكَ، وَلَا يُخْلَفُ وَعْدُكَ، وَلَا يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ، سُبْحَانَكَ وَبِحَمْدِكَ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, I seek refuge in Your generous face and Your perfect words from the evil that You are taking by the corner of it. Oh God, You reveal the debt and the transgression. Oh God, your soldier will not be defeated, your promise will not be broken, and the diligence will not benefit from you, glory be to you and praise be to you.

text: بِاسْمِ اللَّهِ يُبْرِيكَ، وَمِنْ كُلِّ دَاءٍ يَشْفِيكَ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ، وَشَرِّ كُلِّ ذِي عَيْنٍ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: In the name of God, He blesses you, and He heals you from every disease, and from the evil of the envier when he envies, and from the evil of every eye.

text: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِ عَبْدَكَ يَنْكَأُ لَكَ عَدُوًّا ، أَوْ يَمْشِي لَكَ إِلَى صَلاةٍ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: Oh God, heal your servant who insults you as an enemy, or walks for you to pray.

text: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ فِي الْعَالَمِينَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ.
hint-en: Ruqyah is based on the Sunnah of the Prophet
text-en: O God, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You blessed Abraham and the family of Abraham. You are Praiseworthy and Glorious. O God, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You have blessed Abraham and the family of Abraham in the worlds. You are Praiseworthy and Glorious.
